ygData.subject: Taniz says hello (and a few notes)
ygData.msgSnippet: My name is Taniz, and I m an everquest addictee. (Oops, this isnt the everquest 12 step group!) Just wanted to say a quick hello. I just started
ygData.messageBody:
My name is Taniz, and I'm an everquest addictee.
(Oops, this isnt' the everquest 12 step
group!)<br><br>Just wanted to say a quick hello. I just started
playing about a week ago. I'm a level 8 (and 1/2) Ranger,
playing on the Mith. Marr server. I've met some great
people so far, found a few near my level to group with
and level quickly. I spend most of my time around the
Q. Hills area, or at least I did.....<br><br>Which
leads me to my first note/question. Has anyone else
heard the rumors that the GM's may be leaving Q. Hills
in the state it is in? Full of skele's and warbones?
Kind of makes gnoll hunting on the upper levels of BB
seem tame. :)]<br><br>Note 2:<br>I just started
working on my fletching skill, and as such I've become a
veritable arrow factory! If anyone's looking for arrows
(class 1 wooden, range 75 - but my skill is constantly
improving) let me know. They're going Really cheap! (Mention
this message and I may just give 'em to ya.
LOL)<br><br>I look forward to meeting you all.<br><br>May your
blade drip the blood of your enemies,<br><br>Taniz
